summary: Let's sate that appetite! Try the new Talos Sandwich and eat like a true nord hero. Perhaps you are in the mood for something a little more novel... then a piping hot Pizza Pie might just be the answer. Uh, oh nevermind, I think you get the picture.
descriptionHtml:
[size=100][b][color=yellow]A patch for the iNeed mod is now available. It can be located in the miscellaneous file section. Enjoy![/color][/b][/size]


Description
===========
Let's sate that appetite! Try the new Talos Sandwich and eat like a true nord hero. Perhaps you are in the mood for something a little more novel... then a piping hot Pizza Pie might just be the answer. Uh, oh nevermind, I think you get the picture.

Requirements
============
1) A vanilla version is available. Hearthfire is NOT a requirement. However, without Hearthfire the potato bread, flour sack and other HF features will not be available.

2) The main file requires* perseid9's mod: Realistic Needs and Diseases. Perseid9 has recently decided to end work on the RND mod. It still a wonderful mod and still offers more features than others currently available. It can be found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26228/?

*Fine! If you really don't want the RND mod.... (tsk. lol) ...there is an optional file you can use. :-)

3) This mod "NOT" required but I HIGHLY recommend acdcdave1387's mod: Cooking for Alchemy. It adds Alchemy experience for cooking. woohoo! It can be found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28030/?


Details
=======
This mod adds a few NEW food items to the Skyrim menus. Simply to add a little variety (or an extra resource for modders). Is it lore friendly? Eh...I will leave that up to you.

The items included are:

~New Items~
Talos Sandwich - eat like a hero! (craftable)
Imperial Loaf - So as not to offend our Imperial friends. :-) (craftable)
Clams Haafingar (craftable)
Pizza Pie (craftable)
Salmon Cakes (craftable)
Eggplant *See below*
Grilled Eggplant (craftable)
Eggplant Tomato Bisque (craftable)
S'mores (NOT craftable)
Hot Fudge Cake (NOT craftable)
Ginger Beer (non-alcoholic can be used to quench thirst or as a child's gift) (craftable)

~Recolors~
Milk
Dog Meat
Venison
Raw Beef
Horse Meat
Green and Red Apples
Flour Sack
Potato Bread

*The Eggplant IS a harvestable item


Load Order
==========
This must be placed AFTER Realistic Needs and Diseases in your load order. (As RND is one of the master files for this plug in) Trying to place it anywhere above the Realistic Needs mod will make your Skyrim game very unhappy.


Install
=======

Install using Nexus Mod Manager. (recommended)


Manual Install
--------------
1. Extract this archive to any folder and then copy the contents to Skyrim's Data
folder. You can ignore or delete the "fomod" folder.
2. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, and enable the .esp file.


Uninstall
=========

Uninstall using Nexus Mod Manager. (recommended)

Manual Uninstall
----------------
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file.
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.



Incompatibility
===============
None that I am aware of....


History
=======
1.1, 2014/04/25 - fixed missing files which was preventing the eggplant from being planted or harvested. Changed few textures, I think the look a little better hope you like them. :-)

1.0, 2013/10/08 - Initial release.

Contact Info
========
You can find me on Nexus or on Steam as 'JadeRoyale'


Credits
=======
Thanks to perseid9 for the awesome mod: Realistic Needs and Diseases, which this addon was created for in the first place. ;-)
Thanks to Bethesda for creating The Elder Scrolls.
Thanks to Nexus.com for being there!
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.

Tools Used
==========
7-Zip - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=15579
GIMP - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=14920
NIFSkope - http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope
TES5Edit - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=11536
Creation Kit - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=11367
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but all I ask in return is that you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod. I would also like to know what mods are including my work.
